text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Challenges in the Sector
Digital Literacy Among Farmers: Need for training on Fin Tech adoption. Trust Deficit in Online Transactions: Farmers' reliance on traditional markets. Supply Chain Management: Ensuring consistent quality and timely deliveries. Regulatory Compliance: Adhering to RBI guidelines on digital lending in the agri-sector.
